name: The Film 'French Kiss' Quiz | Movies | 10 Questions

questions.text: 'French Kiss' stars Meg Ryan as Kate. Who plays Luc Teyssier, the hero?
questions.explanation:
Kevin Kline.

	Kevin Kline plays Luc with a pretty convincing French accent. Billy Crystal was in 'Forget Paris', Gerard Depardieu was in 'Green Card' and Tom Hanks is Tom Hanks.

questions.text: What is Kate's nationality in the film?
questions.explanation:
American.

	She is technically an American, resident in Canada, and in the middle of applying for Canadian citizenship when the film opens.

questions.text: Kate goes to France, following her fiance, Charlie. Why did he go to France?
questions.explanation:
Medical convention.

	Medical convention - the other options sound much too exciting!

On the airplane.

	They meet when given adjacent seats on the plane, much to Kate's disgust.

questions.text: What kind of plant does Luc smuggle into France?
questions.explanation:
Vine.

	It is a vine cutting to start a new vinyard.

questions.text: Which hotel in Paris does Kate go to?
questions.explanation:
George V.

	The other famous hotel in the film is the Carlton in Cannes.

questions.text: Luc and Kate both have criminal records. What was Kate's offence?
questions.explanation:
Smoking pot.

	Kate is embarrassed by this one event that comes back to haunt her when dealing with the authorities.

questions.text: Kate's character is allergic to one type of food, what?
questions.explanation:
Dairy products.

	Her allergy to dairy products causes a problem when she eats lots of cheese!

questions.text: What is the name of Kate's love rival?
questions.explanation:
Juliette.

	Appropriately for a romance, she is called Juliette.

questions.text: Why does the detective following Luc have a soft spot for him?
questions.explanation:
Luc saved his life.

	Luc saved his life, and gets a lot of tolerance in return!
